rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MAE3965, MEC3465} OR  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MAT2901, MAT2902, MEC3401, MEC3469} OR  (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MEC3451} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MEC3454}))
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CHE2161, MEC2404} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CHE2163, MEC3454})
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-MECH, MAEMECH01} Otherwise true
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-MECH, MAEMECH01} Otherwise true

unitName: Momentum, energy & mass transport in engineering systems
description: Unsteady heat conduction, numerical solutions to multi-dimensional conduction problems. Derivation of general governing equations for fluid flow, heat transfer and mass transfer. Free and forced convection heat transfer in laminar and turbulent flow regimes. Fundamentals of mass transfer. Introduction to two-phase heat transfer. Applications to mechanical engineering systems: fuel cells and alternative energy devices, heat pipes in electronics cooling, micro-scale heat transfer and bioheat transfer.
